name: estorerunner
overview:
US households make an average of 2.7 or 270 million weekly trips to the local supermarket alone.

estorerunner.com is a hyper-local B2B2C disruptive lead generation, home delivery platform offering significant improvements and competitive advantages over first generation “last mile” service providers. estorerunner.com leverages the in-place infrastructure in click and mortar, technology, logistics, franchising and a cost competitive personal delivery service to level the playing field in lead generation and local home delivery for retailers and provide time-savings and convenience to their customers.

The estorerunner.com home delivery operating system offers over 1000 free features, such as real time package and delivery tracking, flexible timing schedule, delivery fee subsidy, lead generation and many, many more free features.

estorerunner.com delivers groceries, prescriptions, hardware store items, laundry, department stores, restaurants, small auto parts same-day, prices starting at $8.99.

estorerunner.com removes transportation from the “last mile” equation nation-wide for local brick and mortar retailers.
